columns.Player_ID: The unique identifier for each player.
columns.Name: The full name of the player.
columns.Country: The country where the player originates.
columns.Earnings: The total earnings of the player.
columns.Events_number: The total number of events the player participated in.
columns.Wins_count: The total number of wins achieved by the player.
columns.Club_ID: The identifier of the club the player belongs to.

player.table_description: The table tracks player details and their performance statistics.

columns.Club_ID: The unique identifier for each club.
columns.Name: The official name of the club.
columns.Manager: The name of the club's manager.
columns.Captain: The name of the club's captain.
columns.Manufacturer: The brand that manufactures the club's kit.
columns.Sponsor: The name of the club's sponsor.

club.table_description: The table holds details about clubs and their management.
